page.title: 16THE HORSESHOE PUB.
page.content: The Pub is at Thurlby Cross Roads. Many years ago the Pub was called the Three Horseshoes but it was shortened to the Horseshoe.This year they have made a new part for children.I have been there once.It is very nice but I was not allowed any drinks like brandy whisky beer or cider.I was only allowed any pop,lemonade or orange drinks.Ithink the parents part is the best.It is not very big really.There is a restaurant where you can eat meals and play games like gambling and darts.The pub opens about six o'clock and ends at eleven o'clock.I like choosing from a menu because it is fun being like mum and dad.In the summer there are seats outside where families can have drinks and little children can play games.A goat is tethered in the garden which saves cutting the grass.
